sourcesContent:
<template>
    
</template>


<script>

    export default{
        name:'Personalização_Escolhas',
        components:{

        },
        data(){
            return{
                imagem:' ',
                desenho:'',
                borda:'',
            }
        },
        methods: {

        },
    }


</script>


<style scoped>
    #personalize{
        margin: 20px;
        text-align: center;
    }
    #borda{
        text-align: center;
        margin: auto;
        width: 300px;
        height: 200px;
        border: 6px solid black;
    }
    #imagemperso{
        height: 189px;
        width: 289px;
    }
    #desenhoperso{
        height: 150px;
        width: 150px;
        margin-top:-215px;
        border-radius: 5px;
    }
    img{

        width: 100px;
        margin: 20px;
        height: 100px;
        text-align: center;
        cursor: pointer;
    }
    div{
        margin: 20px;
        display: inline;
        text-align: center;

    }
    #imagem{
        margin: 20px;
        display: inline;
        text-align: center;
    }
    #azul{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color: rgb(0, 89, 255);
    }
    #rosa{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color: deeppink;
    }
    #amarelo{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color: yellow;
    }
    #laranja{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color:orange;
    }
    #verde{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color: rgb(3, 196, 3);
    }
    #roxo{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color: purple;
    }
    #preto{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-color: black;
    }
    #branco{
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        background-color: whitesmoke;
        cursor: pointer;

    }
    p{
        cursor: pointer;
        margin: 20px;
    }
    #cor{
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
        margin: 20px;

    }
    div{
        margin: 20px;
    }
    h3{
        text-align: center;
    }
    img{
        width: 100px;
        height: 100px;
        margin: 20px;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: center;
    }
    div{
        margin: 20px;
        display: inline;
        text-align: center;
    }
</style>
